episodes.title: Vücutçu Yalvaç
episodes.plot: Ilkkan's nephew Yalvaç pays a visit to him. But the bodybuilding lifestyle of Yalvaç creates problems and controversies both in the group and in the neighborhood.

episodes.title: Kuki
episodes.plot: Yilmaz and Ersoy start a charity campaign in the neighborhood to do a favor for a disabled child, Ilkkan gets into trouble to get rid of his debts and asks the group for help.

episodes.title: Bej
episodes.plot: The group tries to help Yilmaz's nephew Kutay get the role he wants in a play.

episodes.title: Sokak Röportaji
episodes.plot: Yilmaz, Ilkkan, and Ersoy get in trouble for something Yilmaz said and they try to flee the city.

episodes.title: Çaça ve Cosplay
episodes.plot: Yilmaz finds it strange what Ilkkan and Ersoy do under the influence of their girlfriends.

episodes.title: Iki Içi Disi Bir Kisi
episodes.plot: When Ersoy's shoot-from-the-hip uncle starts causing mayhem both in the group and in the neighborhood, Yilmaz and Ilkkan summons an old friend for help.

episodes.title: Gelin Basi
episodes.plot: Yilmaz and Ilkkan get competitive about helping their friend Ersoy show-off at a wedding.

episodes.title: Resimdeki Ünlü
episodes.plot: Ilkkan solves a puzzle, in which the name of a child celebrity is asked. Ilkkan, Yilmaz and Ersoy are trying to find out who this person is.

episodes.title: Esref Hidayet Gürdal Kültür Merkezi
episodes.plot: Ilkkan and Yilmaz are locked in a room of a cultural center with a dance team, waiting to be rescued.

episodes.title: Vita Brevis
episodes.plot: While the Senate of the Roman Republic is prosecuting a senator declared a traitor by the Emperor, one of the senators unintentionally finds a new method of execution.
